heading: As Gentle as a Summer Breeze.
subheading: Never catch a cold from air conditioning again. Experience the perfect comfort of diffuse cooling. Enjoy pleasant, draft-free air, purified from allergens and impurities, cooled evenly for maximum comfort.
why_info_item_1_description: The draft-free, diffuse cooling system of Stellair ensures even and gentle distribution of cooled air throughout the room without unpleasant drafts. This system enhances comfort without the risk of catching a cold.
why_info_item_2_description: Only 18 decibels – as quiet as a ticking clock. In its quietest mode, Stellair is virtually inaudible. Perfect for bedrooms, offices, and any space where peace and comfort matter. In other words, for every space.
why_info_item_3_description: UVC light completely eliminates all bacteria and viruses, while the ionizer removes dust, allergens, and other impurities. The combination of these innovations in Naitec Sensitive air conditioners creates a healthier and safer environment in your home.
why_info_item_4_description: Wi-Fi connectivity allows you to easily adjust temperature, modes, and other functions from your smartphone or tablet, anytime, anywhere.
why_info_item_5_description: The high energy efficiency of R32 refrigerant ensures more effective cooling and heating while significantly reducing environmental impact, making it an ideal choice for a more sustainable future.
all_you_need_item_1_description: Naitec Sensitive automatically cleans, sterilizes, and then disinfects its internal evaporator with UV light to keep your air fresh, free from bacteria and viruses.
all_you_need_item_1_long_description: When the “sterilization” function is activated, the indoor unit's evaporator first freezes and then heats up to 57°C, which, in combination with the UVC lamp and ionizer, ensures thorough cleaning of the indoor unit and elimination of harmful bacteria. This technology brings a refreshing atmosphere to your home and provides a healthy environment without unnecessary negative effects.
all_you_need_item_2_description: The ability to efficiently heat down to -35°C ensures a comfortable and pleasant environment even on the coldest winter days.
all_you_need_item_3_description: We prioritize quality, which is why Naitec Sensitive comes with a 5-year warranty, ensuring long-term reliability.
all_you_need_item_3_long_description: The extended warranty is valid only if regular maintenance is performed at least once a year by the supplier from whom you purchased the air conditioner.
all_you_need_item_4_description: The optional Lisa voice controller allows for easy and convenient voice control of your air conditioner.
all_you_need_item_5_description: In the app, you can set a performance limit for your air conditioner, allowing you to save up to 70% on energy.
